extendedInfo.description: â Sept.2013  Big Sale~! 50%Off $1.99-->$0.99âIf you could not download pop-up Book on Google Play, you can get it on Amazon appstore, Samsung appstore.Do you want to see, hear and play with your kids?Do you want to have a valuable remembers with your kids?Here we have for you and your kids â Puss in Bootsâ.Puss in Boots consists of 3D pop-up scenes with RPG (character role-playing game) elements of the characters in combination with interaction for young readers. Children can experience the pleasure of game and education effect at the same time.Sit down with your child as you are running the apps, and talk about Puss in Boots while listening to the music and touching the interesting objects inside it. It will be a valuable time for your child to cherish for lifetime.Fairy tale you read to your child will be the story of you and your child.â» Features:â Full 3D experience - Itâs just like a real book, Lifelike 3D Pop-up scenes filled with beautiful illustrations and musicâ Touch or drag interactive elements in the 3D pop-up scenesâ Fun and exciting interactivity to enhance the liveliness of the story themeâ Fancy and lovely characters popping up out of the impressive scenes of the storiesâ Three dimensional rotation effect for a natural reading experience â Modern lanuage adaptation of the classical version âPuss in Bootsâ written by Charles Perraultâ» Reviews -"Puss in Boots is definitely worth the value, even over and beyond..This is a very highly recommended app that is totally worth having.." Rating âââââ Oct1st, 2012 -by www.theiphoneappreview.com -I think these types of early reading and activity apps are fantastic, but more importantly, so does my daughter. I would recommend Puss in Boots as for any child learning to read or getting ready to learn. Rating ââââ NOV 19, 2012 by www.appcraver.com Editor' Pick  -I was really impressed by this app. I feel it was well-executed and had a nice balance between telling a classic story and offering games that relate to the storyline. It doesn't look thrown together like many apps I've seen. You get way more than you pay for out of this app. Rating âââââ by Becky B. www.reviewfordev.com â» Intended for:â Kids ages 2-6 (Preschool-aged)â» Other Fairy Taleâ Ant&Grasshopper:3D Story Bookâ Cinderella 3D Pop-up Book Liteâ Cinderella : 3D Pop-up Book â Thumbelina : 3D Popup Bookâ» More Information :â Website : http://www.cluepop.comâ FaceBook : http://www.facebook.com/CluePopâ YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/user/Cluepoint

reviews.title: Love these stories and layout
reviews.comment: But this story is not appropriate for children. There is a lot of violence in this book
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: My daughter loves these story\'s and found this one to be appropriate for kids I did not see it being too violent. The layout is great!
